43169a2852ce4bb1580df3855c63a78a: Choose a category (colours, animals, dinosaurs). Take turns naming items until one of you gets stuck.
8392ffeda5a24344d6aa05a64ee790ae: Count how many trees you pass on your way to the bus station. Brag that factoid to someone you meet.
2ba4085f534b23493ee7d5c4b5d1a0fd: Find 5 things with letters or numbers on them.
1cdcca69cacc7d1f988ddcfbc6e84fe1: Find the letters of your child's name in street signs together.
06364cfccd5bb9ce8e304ffb76164d0c: Make the sounds of the different vehicles passing you by.
1747a2c8df619ec35084f7159e1d7e2a: Make up a different name for an everyday object and start using it.
5e890e75cee3b1f1804736ae581f4496: Make up a story using the things you can see around you. You kid should try to point them out.
754c0cb6e88eb22713df43ef65cccfda: Make up names for dogs you see. People, too.
b92dcb9e0f9f30056ba8d13a7d636019: Name an animal - the other one should make its sound or move like it.
842f2819f6ff1dcd0c2d38b80f89ef73: Name the furthest thing you can spot. Make it into a competition.
7b9bf214a6d16643580da0cdd4d1faf2: Pick up some things off the ground and make an obstacle course.
26f577091b10d8ab8e70d74117ce26cc: Place 6 objects on the ground together. Tell you child to look away, take one out. Let them guess what it is.
d61b84300e00f6d01b2a58f838ec7383: Play Freeze to the sound of your own singing.
bba4e1d3b3d31e4b587d100a6fb59c3a: Play I Spy with My Little Eye.
99a6481f1de0e8b727f3c0d868f6c4e8: Play Memory Supermarket. Take turns adding things to a memory shopping list. How many items can you remember?
28a2fb9d7c0ba049f236d4aea998e5fd: Play pick-up sticks with some twigs: Drop them on the floor in a pile and try to remove one without disturbing the pile.
f048f33320b59eb38073de94f42393c5: Search the we for "monkey making a face". Take turns imitating the faces.
2c7462406d39c6f22a9b9a95a1ea7aff: Stand up right. Drop a penny on your shoe without it falling off. Challenge your kid.
0869b5b48b6d416a1bfdae30f05d74a9: Take some funny selfies with your child. Ask them to pick their favourite. Let them pick a family member to send the picture to.
dd3ee4f3092d516666f71236e8b4725c: Take turns finding shapes in the clouds. Try to be as descriptive as possible and encourage your child to do so as well.
42b99dc5ac68ef8ff307f2a7493302bc: Try to recite a poem or song you both like.
